page.description: The Button layout property defines whether an image, some text, or a combination of image and text are used for a ControlBar button.

section.description: For more information on how to add built-in SVG images to a controlbar see '[Adding a Button to a ControlBar]'. The options for the Button layout property are as follows:

case.title: Text only
case.description: Text only displays the button as text. The text to be displayed can be defined in the Button text property.

case.title: Image only
case.description: Image only displays an image for a button. The image can be set using the 'Icon' property. There are multiple ways of defining images for a ControlBar using this property. Using SVG is highly recommended and a number of pre-built SVG icons are available if the 'Style name' property on the properties page is set to 'Alpha'.
